allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix Risk Response Strategy module with approval workflow and chart

- Add status-based button logic \(Open, In-Progress, Awaiting Approval, Completed\)
- Add Submit for Approval and Approve actions with success dialogs
- Add normalizeStatus function to handle status variations
- Sync status and assessmentStatus fields in API
- Fix Task Progress donut chart rendering in Risk View detail page
- Remove "All" option from strategy/progress dropdowns to match source

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Risk Settings APIs and detail pages

- Add Risk Assessment detail page \([id]\)
- Add Risk Settings category detail page \([category]\)
- Add CRUD APIs for risk configuration:
  - Control strengths
  - Impact categories and ratings
  - Risk likelihoods and ranges
  - Risk score config
  - Risk sub-categories
  - Threat categories
  - Vulnerability categories and ratings

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
